mapper.select: select permissions from employee where employee_id = #{employeeId} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into employee(employee_id,name, password, age, position_id, department_id, permissions) values (#{employeeId},#{name}, #{password},#{age},#{positionId}, #{departmentId}, #{permissions})
mapper.select: select employee_id,name,age,position_name,department_name,phone,email,permissions from employee e left join hr.position p on e.position_id = p.position_id left join hr.department d on p.department_id = d.department_id
select name, age, position_id, department_id, phone, email, permissions from employee where department_id = (select department_id from employee where employee_id = #{employeeId})
